early.sandgem.rowan.1.base: So, you've obtained your first partner Pokémon.
early.sandgem.rowan.1.expanded: I see you've already formed a bond with your first partner Pokémon—excellent.
early.sandgem.rowan.1.speaker: prof

early.pokedex.gift.base: Here is your Pokédex. It will record data automatically.
early.pokedex.gift.expanded: Accept this Pokédex—it will automatically record detailed data on any Pokémon you encounter.
early.pokedex.gift.speaker: prof

early.rival.challenge.base: I'll keep getting stronger! You do the same!
early.rival.challenge.expanded: I'm going to train nonstop and get way stronger—you'd better keep pace too!
early.rival.challenge.speaker: rival
